friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name for the phone number

phone_number.description: The phone number in E.164 format

lata.description: Local access and transport area code

rate_center.description: Rate center associated with the phone number

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the phone number's location

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the phone number's location

locality.description: Locality or city where the phone number is based

region.description: Region or state where the phone number is located

postal_code.description: Postal code of the phone number's area

iso_country.description: The ISO country code for the phone number

address_requirements.description: Address requirements for purchasing the phone number

beta.description: Indicates if the phone number is in beta testing phase

capabilities.description: Represents the capabilities of the available mobile phone numbers such as SMS and voice services

voice.description: Indicates if voice calling capability is available

SMS.description: Indicates if SMS messaging is supported

MMS.description: Indicates if MMS messaging is supported

fax.description: Indicates if fax capability is available
